mapper.insert: insert into image_main (uuid, suffix, md5, location, url, validStatus, insertTime, updateTime) values (#{uuid}, #{suffix}, #{md5}, #{location}, #{url}, #{validStatus}, #{insertTime}, #{updateTime})
mapper.update: update image_main set validStatus=#{validStatus}, updateTime=#{updateTime} where uuid=#{uuid}
